objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#c50000'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#ff3300'/></linearGradient><filter id='noise' x='0%' y='0%' width='100%' height='100%'><feTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/><feBlend mode='overlay' in='SourceGraphic'/></filter></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><g opacity='0.2' filter='url(#noise)'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#ffffff'/></g><g fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05'><path d='M 540,100 L 140,800 L 940,800 Z' stroke='#ffcc00' stroke-width='5'/><path d='M 340,150 L 140,450 L 540,450 Z' stroke='#ffcc00' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M 740,150 L 540,450 L 940,450 Z' stroke='#ffcc00' stroke-width='3'/></g><g fill='#000000' opacity='0.1'><path d='M 540,150 L 240,650 L 840,650 Z' stroke='#000000' stroke-width='2'/></g></svg>

objects.text: Pack of 64, 1.75oz bags | Bold Tortilla Chips

product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099 Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 112.0 Ounce ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and energetic design centered around a snack product. The background is a vibrant gradient transitioning from deep red to bright orange, overlaid with faint geometric triangular patterns to add texture and depth. The top features large, eye-catching text (id: `heading`) showcasing the product name, followed by a smaller subtitle (id: `subheading`) indicating the flavor. The central focus is a high-resolution image of the product (id: `product_image`). Beneath it lies a brief product description (id: `description`), a bold price display (id: `price`), and a prominent call-to-action button labeled with the text (id: `cta`) set against a dark rectangle (id: `cta_background`).

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Red: #c50000
- Bright Orange: #ff3300
- White: #FFFFFF
- Black: #000000
- Accent Yellow: #FFCC00
product_color: The product image features a bold, vibrant color palette dominated by fiery red (#C1272D) used as the background, evoking intensity and appetite appeal. This is complemented by deep black (#000000) as a contrast in the logo and graphics, creating a striking focal point. The Doritos chips themselves are a rich cheesy orange (#F9A602), enhanced with yellow tones (#FFD700) to emphasize flavor and crunch. White (#FFFFFF) outlines the logo text, providing clarity and pop. These colors blend seamlessly through sharp contrasts and glow effects, yet remain individually highlighted to create an eye-catching and appetizing design perfect for a dynamic advertisement banner.
